transcript: Then why is she still single? I mean, New York is full of men, why isn't she married? Probably 100 people told her she's foolish, but she's weighted.

segments.text: Then why is she still single? I mean, New York is full of men, why isn't she married?
Probably 100 people told her she's foolish, but she's weighted.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Then why is she still single? I mean, New York is full of men.  Why isn't she married?  Probably a hundred people told her she's foolish but she's waited.
